text: The University of Andorra () is a public school of higher education. It was formed in 1997.Virtual and tangible goals with a Pyrenean flavour, a 10 March 2006 article from Times Higher Education It is the only university in Andorra. The university has a school of nursing, a school of management and computer science, and a center for online studies. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Europe Category:1997 establishments in Europe Category:Organizations based in Andorra
title: Universitat d'Andorra
